name: ''Pontifical University of, Saint Thomas Aquinas''
former_names: ''Collegium Divi Thomae'', (1577–1580)  ''Collegium Divi Thomae de Urbe'' (1580–1906)  ''Pontificium Collegium Divi Thomae de Urbe'' (1906–1908)  ''Pontificium Collegium Internationale Angelicum'', (1908–1926)  ''Pontificium Institutum Internationale Angelicum'', (1926–1942)  ''Pontificium Athenaeum Internationale Angelicum'', (1942–1963)
